snippet: Harry Shipp scored three times as Chicago withstood the Red Bulls’ late surge and held on for a 5-4 victory, the first of the season for the Fire.
abstract: Soccer Roundup; Chicago Fire defeat New York Red Bulls, 5-4, in Major League Soccer; other scores and news noted.
lead_paragraph: Harry Shipp scored three times as Chicago withstood the Red Bulls’ late surge and held on for a 5-4 victory, the first of the season for the Fire.

headline.main: Rookie’s Hat Trick Gives Fire First Win, Ending Red Bulls’ Run
headline.print_headline: Rookie’s Hat Trick Gives Fire First Win, Ending Red Bulls’ Run
